data.name: Protect Ukraine
data.detailed_description:
This is a casual game that requires a defensive strategy. Build your own weapon facility, your goal is to destroy the enemy and defend Ukraine.


Where to build guards is an important choice in any tower defense game. In Protect Ukraine, the enemy will continue to follow the path to the target, you need to think carefully about what kind of coverage your guards will have, which means some places are better than others, but they are limited; you need Think carefully about your game layout so that you can plan and utilize these locations and buildings wisely.


How the game works
Click the defense setting icon with the mouse, and then click the ground that can be built to complete the construction

data.short_description: This is a casual game that requires a defensive strategy. Build your own weapon facility, your goal is to destroy the enemy and defend Ukraine.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics 3000 or above
  • Storage: 160 MB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or higher
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
